KyleUnited States of AmericaOur recent stay at Hotel Barcelona was nothing short of exceptional. Located in the vibrant heart of the city, this gem offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience.

From the moment we stepped into the hotel, we were greeted with a warm welcome and impeccable service. The lobby exudes elegance with its modern decor and inviting atmosphere. The front desk staff was incredibly helpful, providing insightful recommendations for local dining and attractions.

The room was a sanctuary of tranquility, beautifully appointed with contemporary furnishings and an eye for detail. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, ensuring restful nights after exploring the city. The large windows offered stunning views of Barcelona‚Äôs skyline, and the en-suite bathroom was a haven of relaxation with high-end toiletries and a spacious shower.

Dining at the hotel was a delight. The breakfast buffet featured a wide array of fresh, delicious options, from pastries and fruits to hearty hot dishes. The rooftop terrace provided a picturesque setting for an evening drink, with panoramic views of the city‚Äôs landmarks.

The hotel's location is ideal for tourists. It is just a short walk from major attractions such as La Rambla, the Gothic Quarter, and the renowned Passeig de Gr√†cia. Public transportation is easily accessible, making it convenient to explore further afield.

In summary, Hotel Barcelona offers a superb experience for travelers seeking luxury and comfort in a prime location. The combination of exceptional service, elegant accommodations, and prime location makes it a standout choice for anyone visiting this vibrant city. We will certainly return on our next trip to Barcelona!!.

We stayed in a room in the new wing with wide balcony and a breathtaking view on the Pacific ocean and the Fijian mountains. Very good breakfast buffet included, tasty luncheons, candle light dinner, coffee/cake and ice cream cute little place in the front part of the hotel overseeing Albert park. name: Airways Hotel
description:
This stylish and award-winning luxury hotel is set in its own botanical gardens with stunning views over Bootless Bay to the mountains. AndrewAustraliaThe Airways is my hotel of choice in Port Moresby. It's very convenient for the airport and for working with agencies who are based near the airport. Staff are consistently friendly and try and be helpful.   The property is spectacular with a very spacious vibe - the bookcases, reading and lounge areas lend a real air of relaxation, and the gym in the complex is useful. The rooms (I've had a few) range from nice to spectacular.  Meals are excellent by PNG standards.  Also, a special note about the business centre - I've often gone to them with short notice printing requests and they are very helpful with doing reasonable printing for no extra charge. 
Working in PNG can feel a bit suffocating if your employer does not allow you to travel without security, so the roomy Airways is great in that context.

name: Kumari Boutique Hotel
description: Conveniently set in the center of Kathmandu, Kumari Boutique Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. danielleUnited States of AmericaKumari Boutique Hotel felt like home. A perfect piece of calm and tranquility amidst the busy streets of Kathmandu. The location is ideal, within walking distance of restaurants, cafes, spas, vibrant markets, and cultural heritage sites. Durbar Square, a UNESCO World heritage site, and the Garden of Dreams are within 10-15 mins walking distance. The hotel is charming with beautiful cultural architectural design elements on the outside and modern finishings for comfort on the inside. The wifi is fast. Equipped with an elevator for accessibility. The rooms are clean and there are only 18 rooms so it's nice and quiet. The staff are warm and kind. Always ready to help. I was able to exchange money and even take advantage of their tour desk. The food is amazing! Order the traditional Nepali curry chicken set for lunch or dinner. They also offer complimentary masala tea. As a solo female traveler I felt absolutely safe. 10/10 would definitely recommend.
